definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)

sentences.english: Do you know how many boarders in our school?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我们学校有多少寄宿生吗？

sentences.english: Your Homestay should also give you a map and tell you how to get to the college.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿家庭也会给你一张地图并告诉你怎么样去学校。

sentences.english: I know many things about English class and our homestay family .
sentences.chinese: 我知道了很多语言班级和我的寄宿家庭的一些事情。

sentences.english: He is an oppidan who boards in a private family.
sentences.chinese: 他是寄宿在私人家庭的寄宿生。

sentences.english: He is an oppidan who boards in a private family.
sentences.chinese: 他是寄宿在私人家庭的寄宿生。

sentences.english: Both borders and day students benefit from the cultural diversity of CA's community.
sentences.chinese: 走读生和寄宿生都得益于学校社区的文化多样性。

sentences.english: students attend a boarding school would cultivate their independence as apart from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 分开怙恃上寄宿黉舍的学生将会培育他们的自力性。

sentences.english: My only child has just started boarding-school.
sentences.chinese: 我的独子刚刚开始他寄宿学校的生活。

sentences.english: III. Strengthening management is the important guarantee to develop the boarding school.
sentences.chinese: 加强管理是寄宿制学校健康发展的重要保障。

sentences.english: Angel: So how's your homestay, Katie?
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂，你的寄宿家庭情况怎么样？

sentences.english: She and her brother are both at boarding school.
sentences.chinese: 她和她弟弟都在寄宿学校念书。

sentences.english: Loud voices and a renewed uproar were raised in front of the boarding-house.
sentences.chinese: 寄宿公寓前又发出声声叫喊，出现了新的骚动。

sentences.english: Based on the above, I agree with you to bring mobile.
sentences.chinese: 基于以上观点，我赞成寄宿生带手机来学校。

sentences.english: Homestay in developed countries already have decades of history.
sentences.chinese: 家庭寄宿在发达国家已经有了好几十年的历史。

sentences.english: All the pupils are boarded and lodged at the school.
sentences.chinese: 全体学生都在学校里寄宿并包伙。

definition: to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to attend school on a temporary basis
to change schools/to transfer to another college
to go to school/to attend school
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
third year in junior middle school
